sentences.sContent: We have a good example in Tanzania.
sentences.sCn: 我们在坦桑尼亚有一个很好的例子。

sentences.sContent: After his visit to South Africa, he will also continue to visit Tanzania and Uganda.
sentences.sCn: 在结束对南非的访问后，他还将继续访问坦桑尼亚和乌干达。

sentences.sContent: Some countries, ranging from Rwanda and Tanzania in East Africa, to Egypt and Morocco in the North and South Africa in the South, have steadily increased their science spending.
sentences.sCn: 从东非的卢旺达和坦桑尼亚，到北非的埃及和摩洛哥，再到非洲南部的南非，一些国家已经稳步增加了它们的科学开支。
